stimulusHtml:
The work shown is The Conversion of Saint Paul, created by Caravaggio, ca. 1601 C.E., during the Baroque era.

Describe at least two visual characteristics of The Conversion of Saint Paul.

Using specific visual evidence, explain at least two ways in which Caravaggio creates a sense of drama in the painting.

Using specific visual evidence, explain how The Conversion of Saint Paul demonstrates change from artistic traditions of the Renaissance.
